block.p: FLYNN-Mary. Peacefully, on August 3, at 94. Beloved mother, grandmother, and great grandmother. Wife of the late Daniel Flynn, former N.Y. Assemblyman. Friends may visit with the family on Thursday at Andrett Funeral Home, 353 Second Ave., 6-8:00 PM. Services Friday 11:00 AM, Epiphany Church, Second Ave. at 22 St. Contributions in Mary's memory can be made to Burlington Health and Rehabilitation, 300 Pearl Street, Burlington, VT 05401.
